titles: That fayth the mother of all good workes iustifieth us before we ca[n] bringe forth anye good worke...
author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
place: [Printed at Malborowe [i.e. Antwerp] in the londe of hesse :
date: the. viii. day of May. Anno M.D.xxviii] [1528]
notes: An edition of: The parable of the wicked mammon.
Title from caption title, leaf A1r.
The imprint from the colophon is false; actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: The parable of the wicked mammon.
Also issued as: A treatyse of the justification by faith only.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Luke XVI --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
